DOC.brief_summary: This initiative prospective study evaluate effect implement physical activity strategy Wisconsin school low socioeconomic status childhood fitness .
DOC.detailed_description: This initiative prospective study evaluate effect implement physical activity strategy Wisconsin school low socioeconomic status childhood fitness . Forty-nine school participate study provide de-identified fitness data student 3 consecutive year . Twenty-five school initiated physical activity intervention year one 24 school initiate physical activity intervention year two .
DOC.criteria: child 3rd 8th grade child could perform PACER ( exercise )
